Cheri Neri
Freelance Graphic Artist at Pixel Nation Graphics
April 15, 2009, Cheri worked with Shelly in the same group

I worked with Cheri Neri at varsity Gold. Her designs were current, trendy, and amazing. She is truly a gifted artist!  She is a wonderful team member. She shared her knowledge and skills and was always available to help or brainstorm. She never said no to more work and always offered her assistance to others. She repeatedly put in extra hours to meet strict deadlines. She has a professional and friendly manner of interacting with her coworkers and sales reps. Many people from the company would ask for Cheri by name to create their products!I sincerely admire Cheri as an artist and person. She is intelligent, dependable, ethical, funny and a joy to be around. I can highly recommend her for any artistic position. She would be an asset to any company.
